translation.en: We are Zoid. We will smash you to dust.
- Totally gonna block you this time. - Not if you can't see.
translation.es: - Esta vez te bloquearé. - ¡No si no puedes ver!

translation.en: - All right, nuggets, five minutes. - We were just gonna beat it.
translation.es: Muy bien, pollitos. ¡Cinco minutos! ¡Estábamos por ganar!

translation.en: - Oh, it's broken. What did you do? - I didn't do anything.
translation.es: - Se rompió. ¿Qué hiciste? - No hice nada.

translation.en: Mom!
Now, don't Mom me. You can play more tomorrow. That game's not going anywhere.
translation.es: Nada de mamá, seguirán jugando mañana. El juego no va a ningún lado.

translation.en: We are Zoid.
We will smash you to dust.
I'm with tech support.
Surrender to Zoid. You cannot hope to defeat us.
translation.es: Ríndete ante Zoid. No puedes vencernos.

translation.en: That's what they all say.
Take that!
Glitch contained.
Hinobi Game Systems apologizes for any inconvenience
translation.es: Hinobi Game Systems se disculpa por cualquier inconveniente

translation.en: this minor glitch may have caused
and will now restore your system's memory.
translation.es: Y ahora reiniciará la memoria del sistema.

translation.en: What did I miss?
We are Zoid. We will smash you to dust.
HQ calling. Come in.
Go for Mitch.
- You finish debugging that Puzzler glitch? - Another flawless victory.
translation.es: - ¿Ya terminaste con ese Glitch? - Otra victoria perfecta.

translation.en: Just be sure to upload all glitches from your gauntlet
when you get back to HQ this time.
translation.es: de tu brazalete cuando vuelvas al cuartel.

translation.en: Thanks for the strategy tip, boss.
Like I need a walk- through.
translation.es: Como si yo necesitara una guía.

translation.en: Okay, I need a moo shu pork carnita,
translation.es: Necesito una carnita de cerdo moo shu,

translation.en: two fried rice and beans, and an order of won- tonquitos. Rápido, Nieto!
translation.es: dos órdenes de arroz frito y frijoles, y una de wantonquitos. Rápido, nieto.

translation.en: Grinding as fast as I can, Papi!
translation.es: Voy lo más rápido que puedo, Papi.

translation.en: Ponzu! Chorizo! Tortilla! I choose you!
Player readies for melee.
translation.es: ¡El jugador se prepara para el combate

translation.en: He sprinkles and unleashes his power combo, the triple chop!
translation.es: ¡El jugador se prepara para el combate y desata su combo de poder, el corte triple!

translation.en: And for the finishing move...
translation.es: SALSA DE SOJA Y para rematarlos...

translation.en: Flawless.
Okay, guys, it's me, K. Moon, and today is the day.
translation.es: Bien, chicos, soy yo, K. Moon y hoy es el día.

translation.en: The seventh annual Hinobi Smash Tournament is here, and the hype is off the charts.
translation.es: Llegó el séptimo torneo anual Hinobi Smash y el despliegue es descomunal.

translation.en: It's set to be the biggest NS competition yet.
translation.es: Será la mayor competencia NS hasta ahora.

translation.en: I'm even hearing the company sent exclusive wristbands
translation.es: Escuché que la compañía envió pulseras exclusivas

translation.en: to the top- ranked gamers in each city.
So, y'all, can I just say, If you got one of these things,
translation.es: Solo diré que si tienen una de estas cosas

translation.en: I am mega jealous of that sweet, sweet swag.
translation.es: estoy megacelosa de ese dulce botín.

translation.en: Okay, so if we're talking competitors,
we gotta talk reigning champ, Mitch Williams.
translation.es: El campeón actual es Mitch Williams.

translation.en: He'll be defending his title for the fourth year in a row--
translation.es: Defiende su título por cuarto año...

translation.en: Five, you're not burning my frijoles in there, are you?
Nursing those trigger fingers?
Sorry, Abuela, I was just--
- Five! Five, you in there? - Five!
We're stuck again.
Ten minutes. Make 'em count, playa.
Thanks, Abuela.
All right, my little rookie game grinders,
you are indeed witnessing the hidden level of Hinobi's 1993 classic, Chomp Kitty.
translation.es: son testigos del nivel oculto del clásico de Hinobi de 1993, Chomp Kitty!

translation.en: What? You heard it was impossible? Too much game to tame?
Well, as long as you feed this cat enough power pellets,
translation.es: Si lo alimentan con muchas bolas de poder,

translation.en: you can use pattern recognition. Boom!
Endless repetition. Zoom.
And your own ambition. Va- da- ba- da- voom.
translation.es: ¡Y su propia ambición, pam, pam, pum!

translation.en: - To make the impossible possible. -
Five, you're the best.
My brother, he said you got one of those bracelets from Hinobi.
translation.es: Mi hermano dijo que tienes una de esas pulseras de Hinobi.

translation.en: You gonna be in that tournament today, Five? You'd dominate!
translation.es: ¿Vas a estar en ese torneo hoy, Five? ¡Lo ganarás!

translation.en: Come on, you guys know my grandparents need me here.
translation.es: Saben que mis abuelos me necesitan aquí.

translation.en: - If I left, who would cook? - Oye, Five!
- Bring yourself back in here! - Ooh, sorry, Papi. I was in the zone!
translation.es: ¡Five! ¡Regrésate aquí! Lo siento, Papi, estaba encendido.

translation.en: Huh? You shut the fryer off?
translation.es: - ¿Apagaste la freidora? - Encontré esto en el piso.

translation.en: Found this on the floor. Has your name on it.
translation.es: - ¿Apagaste la freidora? - Encontré esto en el piso. Tiene tu nombre.

translation.en: That? Oh, that's nothing.
- Sure seems like something. - We looked online.
translation.es: Sí que parece algo. Buscamos en Internet.

translation.en: Says only the best gamers in the city get these.
translation.es: Dice que solo los mejores jugadores de la ciudad los tienen.

translation.en: Says first prize is a job at the Hinobi Game Store.
translation.es: El primer premio es un trabajo en la tienda de juegos Hinobi.

translation.en: I'd think you'd want an opportunity like that, yeah?
translation.es: Creo que querrías una oportunidad así, ¿sí?

translation.en: Of course I would, but the game's today and I gotta work.
translation.es: Claro que sí, pero el torneo es hoy y tengo que trabajar.

translation.en: Besides, even if I won, you guys can't afford to replace me, so--
translation.es: Además, aunque gane, no pueden pagar un empleado, así que...

translation.en: That's not your problem.
- All you gotta do is play your heart out. - Really?
translation.es: Solo debes jugar con el corazón. ¿En serio?

translation.en: You guys mean it? You'd leave work to take me to the game?
Hey, who needs to leave? We'll take our work with us!
translation.es: ¿Quién debe irse? ¡Llevamos el trabajo con nosotros!

translation.en: But this truck hasn't moved since before I was born!
translation.es: Pero no se ha movido desde antes de que yo naciera.

translation.en: It's only a few miles. We can still make it!
translation.es: Son un par de kilómetros, lo haremos.

translation.en: - Hinobi, here we come! - Whoo- hoo!
Yeah! Perfect! Perfect! You're a legend!
I am a legend.
Can't you play in the living room, Miko?
translation.es: ¿No puedes jugar en la sala, Miko?

translation.en: You see this?
This means your big sis is gonna wreck a bunch of fools today.
translation.es: Significa que tu hermanita aplastará a un montón de tontos hoy.

translation.en: I'm invincible!
- - What?
Mom says come to breakfast before you shake the house apart.
translation.es: Mamá dice que vayas a desayunar antes de que derrumbes la casa.

translation.en: You can pull the plug on my TV, but you can't pull the plug on destiny!
translation.es: ¡Puedes desconectar la TV, pero no puedes desconectar el destino!

translation.en: - Pass the milk! - Get it yourself.
translation.es: Dije que me pasaras la leche. - Tómala tú. - ¡Bien!

translation.en: Did you eat all of the cereal?
- You're the worst. - I am.
Two minutes to minivan. Phones off, shoes on. No ifs, ands or--
translation.es: Salimos en dos minutos. Sin teléfonos, con zapatos y...

translation.en: Miko, what are you wearing? I bought you a blouse at Bullseye.
translation.es: Miko, ¿qué es eso? Te compré una blusa en Bullseye.

translation.en: Mom! It's my good luck shirt. For the Hinobi Smash Tournament today.
translation.es: ¡Mamá, es mi camiseta de la suerte! Para el torneo Hinobi Smash de hoy.

translation.en: What is she talking about? What are you talking about?
I posted a note about this on the busy board a month ago!
translation.es: ¡Puse una nota sobre esto en la pizarra hace un mes!

translation.en: I'm showing Geoffery's ballet recital, Lexi's hockey playoff,
translation.es: Hoy es el recital de Geoffrey, el juego de Lexi,

translation.en: Nika's science fair soft open, Lee's preschool parade,
translation.es: la feria de ciencias de Nika, el desfile preescolar de Lee y...

translation.en: and... huh? What exactly is Hinobi Smash?
translation.es: la feria de ciencias de Nika, el desfile preescolar de Lee y... ¿Qué quiere decir Hinobi Smash?

translation.en: It's an exclusive game competition.
translation.es: Es una competencia de juegos exclusiva.

translation.en: Sorry, kiddo. We've got a full day ahead and won't have time to--
translation.es: Lo siento. Tenemos un día ocupado y no hay tiempo...

translation.en: But you guys wouldn't even have to drive me there.
translation.es: Pero ni siquiera tendrían que llevarme.

translation.en: I can just log into the game from home!
You spend enough time in front of that screen already, young lady.
translation.es: Ya fue suficiente tiempo de pantalla. Ahora, cámbiate.

translation.en: Now, get changed. We have a lot of events today.
translation.es: Ya fue suficiente tiempo de pantalla. Ahora, cámbiate. Hoy hay muchas cosas.

translation.en: You're taking everyone else to do the stuff they like, but not me?
translation.es: ¿Llevas a los demás a hacer lo que les gustan, pero a mí no?

translation.en: - That's not fair! -
Okay, that's time! I want butts in belts people!
translation.es: Ya es hora. Quiero traseros en cinturones.

translation.en: Din, din. Do it now, do it now!
Tell you what. You can have a little extra game time tomorrow. Okay, kiddo?
translation.es: Te diré algo, mañana puedes jugar un rato más. ¿De acuerdo, niña?

translation.en: Gang's all here. Let's go!
Miko, it was very irresponsible of you to bail on family day.
translation.es: Miko, fue muy irresponsable saltarte el día familiar.

translation.en: What do you have to say for yourself?
I say you're looking at a first place champion, Mom and Dad!
translation.es: Diré: Están viendo a una campeona, mamá y papá.

translation.en: Oye, muchachos! Who's hungry?
Oh, man. Look at all those people.
Oh, nerds, oh, nerds, oh, nerds.
Get out of that head, you. I swear, you're gonna get lost in there one day,
translation.es: ¡Sal de esa cabeza! Juro que algún día te perderás ahí dentro.

translation.en: and I'm not gonna be able to get you out!
Eh, just have fun. Try not to think too hard.
translation.es: Diviértete. Trata de no pensar demasiado.

translation.en: We are coming at you live
from the Hinobi Store located in the Bailley Square Mall,
translation.es: desde la tienda Hinobi, en el centro comercial Bailley Square,

translation.en: bringing you this year's Nobi Smash challenge,
translation.es: para presentarles el desafío Nobi Smash.

translation.en: sponsored by Hinobi Games and Buzzcore Beverages.
translation.es: Patrocinado por Juegos Hinobi y bebidas Buzzcore.

translation.en: And guess who's out there, pumpin' up this crowd.
translation.es: ¿Y adivinen quién está por ahí entusiasmando a la multitud?

translation.en: They know him. They grew up with him.
Nobi, the Hinobi Honeybee!
Man, that thing creeps me out.
Uh, hi. Sorry, do you work here?
No, I just make it a point to accessorize all my button- downs
translation.es: No, solo vine para complementar mis camisas

translation.en: with manager name tags.
I, uh, have this? Whoa! He's the missing player.
Took your sweet time logging in, didn't you?
translation.es: Te tomaste tu tiempo para ingresar, ¿no? Genial.

translation.en: Great. Let's incite this riot.
translation.es: Te tomaste tu tiempo para ingresar, ¿no? Genial. Incitemos este motín.

translation.en: Give it up for High Five!
All eyes on you, champ.
Okay, we're doing standard competition rule set.
You'll be playing on a new map designed specifically for this tournament.
translation.es: Jugarás en un nuevo mapa diseñado para el torneo.

translation.en: So no outside communication is permitted in play,
and there will be absolutely no respawns. Any questions?
translation.es: y si mueres, no serás clonado. ¿Alguna pregunta?

translation.en: Did you just say no respawns?
Yep. If you're out, you're out.
So don't get nauseous, faint or freak out, and you should do just fine.
translation.es: Así que no sufras náuseas, desmayos o ni enloquezcas, y te irá bien.

translation.en: Whoa!
This is amazing!
Mitch Williams? Is everyone seeing this?
I'm meeting Mitch Williams!
translation.es: Estoy con Mitch Williams. No puedo creerlo.

translation.en: I can't believe it. I learned so much from watching your Let's Play videos.
translation.es: Estoy con Mitch Williams. No puedo creerlo. Aprendí mucho viendo tus videos de A jugar.

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.es: Aprendí mucho viendo tus videos de A jugar. Gracias.

translation.en: We'll be ready to start once our remote players finish logging in!
translation.es: Empezaremos cuando los jugadores remotos ingresen.

translation.en: Here comes one now!
I am ME_K.O.! Join me or die!
Hey, who disabled the voice filter?
- I'm okay. - Whoa!
You're ME_K.O., aren't you?
Yeah! And you are... Hi_5?
translation.es: ¡Sí! Y tú eres... ¿High Five? ¿Conozco a ese jugador?

translation.en: Do I know that gamer tag?
- Defeated by ME_K.O.! -
- Sniped by ME_K.O.! -
Obliterated by ME_K.O.! Aw, come on!
Nope.
Oh, nerds. Relax, bro.
No matter what happens out there, we're all gamers.
translation.es: Pase lo que pase, todos somos jugadores.

translation.en: Thanks.  Three, two, one! Smash!
And gamers play to win!
Hey, man! Let go of my leg!
Uh- uh! I am not letting go of your leg!
Ugh, fine. Then grab the ball!
- Upsies! -
- You owe me one! - It's on.
What up?
Yes!  Duh- nuh- nuh, this is my theme song, nuh nuh!
Bringing rainbows of pain. Miko is the best!
translation.es: Traigo arco iris de dolor ¡Miko es la mejor!

translation.en: Heads up!
Ah, yeah!
You're Mitch Williams!
- And you're not. -
You believe that rager? I guess that's why he's number one.
translation.es: - ¿Viste a ese patán? - Supongo que por eso es el mejor.

translation.en: Number one dingleberry, maybe.
Ugh! I so wanna beat this guy.
All right, look, I just say we gang up on him.
When it's down to just us, best shot wins?
translation.es: Cuando quedemos solos, gana el mejor.

translation.en: - Death to dingleberries! - Uh, was that a yes?
translation.es: ¡Muerte a los tramposos! ¿Eso fue un sí?

translation.en: Sorry!
Wait up. I think I got a plan to get us to the final platform.
translation.es: Tengo un plan para llegar a la plataforma final.

translation.en: We're on the final platform!
Yes! Okay, but slow down. These tiles may be booby- trapped.
translation.es: ¡Sí! Bien, pero más despacio. Estos bloques pueden tener trampas.

translation.en: Slow down? It's a race!  Coming through!
Okay, that's a game changer.
Let's go!
Hold still, you slippery sandworm.
You two realize this isn't co- op, right? There's only one winner, me!
translation.es: Saben que no es un juego en equipos, ¿no? Solo hay un ganador. ¡Yo!

translation.en: - Hey, look out! -
- Close one. - Hmm...
Wait. It's a puzzle.
Yeah!
Yes! This is for the win!
Hey! Look out!
Come on!
My ball, it's stuck! Did this game just glitch on us?
Uh, I'm showing a major software bug in there, Mitch.
translation.es: Veo que este juego tiene un error, Mitch.

translation.en: We need to pull you from the game. Not until I secure this win.
translation.es: - Debemos sacarte del juego. - No hasta que consiga la victoria.

translation.en: - - Your buddy can't score without a ball, and you're dead meat.
translation.es: Tu amigo no puede ganar sin la bola, y tú eres carne muerta.

translation.en: Looks like game over.
translation.es: Parece que se acabó el juego.

translation.en: Not yet, dingleberry.
- Five! - What?
No!
- - Oh, yeah, that's showin' 'em! That's right! You get 'em, mijo! Get 'em!
Yes! Yes! I won! I won!
You can't score with another player's ball like that! That was not fair!
translation.es: ¡No puedes anotar con la bola de otro jugador así! ¡No fue justo!

translation.en: - Yes! I think the all- star just rage quit! -
translation.es: ¡Sí! ¡Creo que la estrella renunció por furia!

translation.en: And we unlocked a bonus level?
You guys saw that bogus shot, right? It can't count!
translation.es: Vieron ese tiro falso, ¿verdad? No puede valer. Dime que hay un Glitch así no vale.

translation.en: Tell me the game's glitched, so it can't count!
translation.es: No puede valer. Dime que hay un Glitch así no vale.

translation.en: We got bigger problems than your high score right now, Mitch.
translation.es: Hay problemas mayores que tu puntaje ahora, Mitch.

translation.en: Plixel breach in three, two--
translation.es: Error de Plixel en tres, dos...

translation.en: - Techs, gauntlets up! -
Let's hear it for augmented reality, folks!
I'll do this myself.
- Think we can take him? - Just one way to find out!
translation.es: - ¿Podemos vencerlo? - Hay una forma de averiguarlo.

translation.en: Whoa! This VR is so tight--
What the...
Zahra, Nix, with me! Take it down!
Hello. A minor glitch has been detected.
translation.es: Hola, se detectó un error menor.

translation.en: Please stand by
- as we restore your system's memory. - What in the...
translation.es: Por favor, espera mientras recuperamos... - ¿Qué? - Diez,

translation.en: Ten, nine, eight...
- Hmm... - ...seven, six,
- five, four... - Okay, okay.
- Whoever wants a free T- shirt... - ...three... - ...you just look right there. - ...two...
translation.es: Quien quiera una camiseta gratis que mire ahí.

translation.en: - Right at the big screen. - ...one.
- What kinda game is this? - The kind nobody's gonna remember.
translation.es: - ¿Qué clase de juego es este? - Del tipo que nadie recordará.

translation.en: Good thing you were never here.
- Never here. - I was never here.
translation.es: Por suerte, nunca estuviste aquí. Nunca estuve aquí.

translation.en: ...and surprising nobody,
translation.es: No fue sorpresa para nadie. Mitch Williams aseguró su  primer lugar

translation.en: Mitch Williams secured his number one spot at the Hinobi Smash Tournament today.
translation.es: No fue sorpresa para nadie. Mitch Williams aseguró su  primer lugar - en el torneo Hinobi Smash. - Pasa esa orden, Five.

translation.en: - Need that order up here, Five! -
translation.es: - en el torneo Hinobi Smash. - Pasa esa orden, Five.

translation.en: You fall asleep on me in there, playa?
What? Oh, uh, sorry. Um, I'm awake, Papi.
I'm awake.
- Miko! - I'm awake!
And she's awake.
You guys are never gonna believe what happened!
translation.es: Nunca me creerán. Estaba en este juego de realidad virtual

translation.en: I was in this VR game, killin' it, like always,
translation.es: Nunca me creerán. Estaba en este juego de realidad virtual ganando, como siempre, cuando un monstruo de verdad

translation.en: when a no- joke- giant- monster hand came through the plasma,
translation.es: ganando, como siempre, cuando un monstruo de verdad atravesé el plasma, me agarró, me tiró al sofá,

translation.en: grabbed me, threw me on the couch and, zschoop, got sucked back into the TV.
translation.es: atravesé el plasma, me agarró, me tiró al sofá, se metió de vuelta a la TV.

translation.en: Next thing I know, the TV's all, Don't move, and I was all, Boom! Whaugh! Voo- oosh!
translation.es: Luego, la TV dijo: No te muevas, pero yo...

translation.en: You believe me, don't you?
Mom, please, it's not fair!
translation.es: Mamá, por favor, no es justo.

translation.en: You can't just take my console away!
I can and am, young lady.
I hope ditching your family today was worth it,
because it was the last video game you'll be playing for a long time.
translation.es: fue el último videojuego que jugarás por mucho tiempo.

translation.en: I was telling the truth!
- Lexi? - What?
Could I maybe borrow your phone for just a second?
translation.es: ¿Me podrías prestar tu teléfono por un segundo?

translation.en: Mom told me not to let you use it. Mom doesn't need to know.
translation.es: - Mamá me dijo que no te dejara usarlo. - No tiene que saber.

translation.en: Just a special secret between us super cool gal pals?
translation.es: ¿Un secreto especial entre dos amigas geniales?

translation.en: What'll you give me if I let you?
translation.es: - ¿Qué harás si te lo doy? - Tus tareas por una semana.

translation.en: - All of your chores for a week. - Month.
translation.es: - ¿Qué harás si te lo doy? - Tus tareas por una semana. Un mes. Y un cohete para mi muñeca Mermaid Mindy.

translation.en: And a jetpack for my Mermaid Mindy doll.
translation.es: Un mes. Y un cohete para mi muñeca Mermaid Mindy.

translation.en: Ugh! Fine!
Okay, let me see here. Now, what was that guy's gamer tag? Yes! Here he is.
translation.es: A ver. ¿Cuál era el nombre de ese tipo? ¡Aquí está! ¡High Five!

translation.en: High Five! He'll know what's up.
Hype- hype! Uh, how much not to tell Mom I'm sneaking out?
translation.es: Él sabrá qué pasó. ¡Sí, sí! ¿Cuánto por no decirle a mamá que me voy?

translation.en: - Mindy needs a laser blaster. -
That mongrel should be a lawyer.
C'mon, High Five, where are you?
Yes!
I found you! In an alley! No judgements.
translation.es: ¡Five, te encontré! En un callejón... No te juzgo.

translation.en: Oh, man, I'm so glad that statue monster didn't crush you.
translation.es: ¡Me alegro que el monstruo no te aplastara!

translation.en: - Do I know you? - It's ME_K.O.!
ME_K.O.?
Defeated, sniped, obliterated by ME_K.O.!
Uh, never heard of you.
We just played in a tournament together.
translation.es: Acabamos de jugar juntos en un torneo.

translation.en: You know, Nobi Smash? The game glitch? The statue monster?
translation.es: ¿Nobi Smash? ¿El Glitch del juego? ¿El monstruo estatua?

translation.en: - We were in a tournament? - How could you not remember?
translation.es: - ¿Participamos de un torneo? - ¿Cómo no te acuerdas?

translation.en: Maybe somebody doesn't want you to remember.
translation.es: Quizá alguien no quiera que recuerdes,

translation.en: Maybe some evil somebody who's trying to hide the truth
translation.es: quizá alguien malvado intenta esconder la verdad,

translation.en: like some kind of... some, some... some- spiracy.
translation.es: como una especie de... Alguna espiración.

translation.en: Come on, I think I'd remember playing Nobi Smash with a statue monster.
translation.es: Si hubiese jugado a Nobi Smash contra un monstruo estatua lo recordaría.

translation.en: So you didn't get a wristband, and you didn't go to the Hinobi Store?
translation.es: ¿No te dieron una pulsera y no fuiste a la tienda Hinobi?

translation.en: Look, the only place I've been for the last three days is this truck.
translation.es: En los últimos tres días solo estuve en este camión,

translation.en: And trust me, it never goes anywhere.
translation.es: y créeme que nunca va a ningún lado,

translation.en: If this a joke, I don't really get it, but, you know, ha ha! You got me!
translation.es: Si es una broma, no la entiendo. Pero ya sabes, me atrapaste.

translation.en: You were at that tournament, Five!
- You need to believe me. - Why?
What does it even matter?
Because you won.
Some- spiracy?
Me, in a tournament? Like I've been anywhere but--
translation.es: ¿Yo, en un torneo? Como si hubiera ido a...

translation.en: Uh, did you or Papi move this truck in the last few days?
translation.es: Abuela, ¿tú o Papi han movido el camión en los últimos días?

translation.en: This old beast hasn't moved in the last few decades!
translation.es: Esta vieja bestia no se ha movido por décadas.

translation.en: Uh, sorry, Abuela, I gotta go.
Hey, you! Hold up!
Look, all right, let's just say I really did play in that tournament,
translation.es: Mira, digamos que jugué en ese torneo.

translation.en: you're saying I beat Mitch Williams?
Uh, yeah. With my help, of course.
translation.es: Sí, con mi ayuda, por supuesto.

translation.en: All right. I don't know what's going on, but I wanna find out.
translation.es: Está bien, no sé qué está pasando, pero quiero averiguarlo.

translation.en: All right! Setting new quest waypoint for the Hinobi Store!
translation.es: ¡Muy bien! ¡Estableciendo una nueva ruta hacia la tienda Hinobi!

translation.en: Man, I love this store.
When I was little, my dad would bring me here for all the latest game releases.
translation.es: Cuando era pequeño, mi papá me traía para todos los lanzamientos.

translation.en: Sometimes, we'd even camp outside the doors
to make sure we got one of the first copies.
Wow. It's cool your family's so into gaming.
translation.es: Qué bueno que a tu familia le gusten los juegos.

translation.en: Mine, not so much.
There's that wrinkly little sandworm!
There he is! Oh, man, Mitch Williams.
I mean, he's, like, a local legend.
Did you know that he won his first competition when he was six?
translation.es: ¿Sabías que ganó su primer torneo a los seis años?

translation.en: And he's still got the highest global score on Nobi's Bubble Tea?
translation.es: Y aún tiene el puntaje más alto en Té burbujeante de Nobi.

translation.en: Well, before you finish that love letter, remember,
translation.es: Antes de que termines esa carta de amor, recuerda, Mitch es el cretino que te limpió el cerebro.

translation.en: Mitch is the creep who probably wiped your brain.
translation.es: recuerda, Mitch es el cretino que te limpió el cerebro.

translation.en: Why didn't he do the same to you?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no te hizo lo mismo?

translation.en: Maybe he did, and it just didn't take.
translation.es: Tal vez lo hizo y no funcionó.

translation.en: Maybe I'm, like, the one, you know?
translation.es: Tal vez soy como La elegida, ¿sabes?

translation.en: Chosen by destiny to protect the innocent from trolls like him!
translation.es: Elegida por el destino para proteger a los inocentes de troles como él.

translation.en: Or not. I dunno.
- Let's go! Wait, stop! -
New plan.
We follow him, stealth- mode style, till he leads us to his den of lies!
translation.es: Lo seguimos con sigilo hasta su guarida de mentiras.

translation.en: Welcome to Mama Miyamoto's Spaghetti in a Bucket,
translation.es: Bienvenidos al balde de espaguetis de Mama Miyamoto,

translation.en: where we put spaghetti in a bucket.
translation.es: donde ponemos espaguetis en un balde.

translation.en: Uh, yeah.
I'll have a small pail with a side of...
Mmm... no.
Welcome to Mama Miyamoto's Spaghetti in a Bucket,
translation.es: Bienvenidos al balde de espaguetis de Mama Miyamoto,

translation.en: where we put spaghetti in a bucket.
translation.es: donde ponemos espaguetis en un balde.

translation.en: Give me two mega buckets and two apple pies.
translation.es: Dame dos megabaldes y dos tartas de manzana.

translation.en: - That'll be $9.75. - Boosh!
Welcome to Mama Miyamoto's-- You know, I'm not really hungry.
translation.es: - Bienvenidos a... - No tengo mucha hambre.

translation.en: Holy smokes! That guy really can mess with minds!
And just made off with about ten pounds of free pasta.
translation.es: Y se llevó unos cinco kilos de pasta gratis.

translation.en: - New plan. Get him! - Good plan!
Hey, champ, we need to talk.
What the... I remember you.
translation.es: ¿Qué...? - Yo te recuerdo. - Y nosotros a ti.

translation.en: And we remember you.
translation.es: - Yo te recuerdo. - Y nosotros a ti.

translation.en: You stole my win. Uh, apparently.
translation.es: Me robaste mi victoria. - Eso parece. - ¿Cómo sabes eso?

translation.en: How can you know about that? I reset you myself.
translation.es: - Eso parece. - ¿Cómo sabes eso? Yo mismo los reinicié.

translation.en: Everybody resets.
Is zapping people your solution to everything?
translation.es: ¿Reiniciar a la gente es tu solución para todo?

translation.en: Pretty sad if you ask me.
Especially since a tool like that could be used to help people, instead of cheating.
translation.es: Sobre todo porque algo así debería ayudar a la gente en vez de engañarla.

translation.en: Everybody resets!
You love to play the hero, but, really, you're just some bully!
translation.es: Te encanta ser el héroe, pero en realidad eres un matón.

translation.en: - I'll wipe you clean! - Stop it!
Let go! You don't know what this thing does!
translation.es: ¡Suéltame! ¡No sabes lo que hace esta cosa!

translation.en: Mitch, we're showing a glitch release from your gauntlet.
translation.es: Mitch, estás liberando un Glitch de tu brazalete.

translation.en: Got it under control. Don't send backup.
translation.es: Lo tengo bajo control. No envíe refuerzos.

translation.en: If that thing goes viral, it could spread through the entire arcade.
translation.es: Ten cuidado. Si se vuelve viral, se extendería a todo el salón.

translation.en: Oh, boosh!
I am done playing with you two whack- a- moles.
translation.es: Me cansé de jugar con ustedes dos imbéciles.

translation.en: This is a serious Mitchuation. I can't have you morons make it any worse!
translation.es: Esta es una Mitch-tuación seria. No permitiré que ustedes, tontos, la empeoren.

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait, wait. Seriously? A Mitchuation?
I used to look up to you...
and now I don't even know who you are!
translation.es: pero ahora ya no sé quién eres.

translation.en: I'll tell you who I am.
I'm the guy who's gonna send you back to the alley you crawled from.
translation.es: Soy el tipo que los enviará de vuelta al callejón donde se arrastraron.

translation.en: And this time, you're gonna stay there... where you belong.
translation.es: Y esta vez se vas a quedar ahí. Donde pertenecen.

translation.en: Security system activated.
Come on, try everything. There's gotta be something we can use in here.
translation.es: Vamos, prueba todo. Debe haber algo que podamos usar.

translation.en: This is out of control.
The kid has stuff that opens portals and erases memories!
translation.es: El chico tiene cosas que abren portales y borran recuerdos.

translation.en: Who knows what else he made us forget? Family members? Pets?
What if we already got out of here but he made us forget we did,
translation.es: Y si ya salimos de aquí y nos hizo olvidarlo

translation.en: so now we think we're still in here? What if we've always been in here?
translation.es: y ahora creemos que aún estamos aquí. ¿Y si siempre estuvimos aquí?

translation.en: You might be overthinking it.
Besides, you know Mitch's play style. He likes to psyche people out.
translation.es: Además, sabes como juega Mitch. Le gusta molestar a la gente.

translation.en: I bet there isn't even a real security system in here.
translation.es: Apuesto a que no hay ningún sistema de seguridad.

translation.en: Well, now we know.
Oh, check it out, Five. A red button.
The mother of all buttons!
Will you stop messing around up there?
From the moment I met you, you've just made everything worse.
translation.es: Desde que te conocí, empeoraste todo.

translation.en: You know what your problem is?
You think too much.
- Where did you... - He must have tossed it in here.
Good thing you were never here.
I did beat Mitch Williams.
translation.es: Sí le gané a Mitch Williams.

translation.en: Give me that.
Please don't blow up. Please don't blow up.
Welcome cadet. I am BITT! A Binary Intelligence Tech Trainer!
translation.es: Bienvenido, cadete. Soy BITT. Un entrenador de Inteligencia Binaria.

translation.en: Searching for updates.
None found.
Hey, maybe he can help us get out of this van.
translation.es: Tal vez pueda ayudarnos a salir de esta camioneta.

translation.en: I am sorry but my services are for the exclusive use of Glitch Tech recruits.
translation.es: Lo siento, mis servicios son exclusivos de los reclutas de Glitch Tech.

translation.en: I also dispense food and beverages.
Fresh- baked muffin? Mmm.
I want one for Christmas!
What's a Glitch Tech?
Citizens employed by Hinobi
for the purposes of detecting and capturing glitch entities!
translation.es: con el fin de detectar y capturar entidades Glitch.

translation.en: Uh, that's us all right!
translation.es: Somos nosotros. ¡Nuevos aprendices que se reportan!

translation.en: New trainees reporting for duty. Right, Five?
translation.es: Somos nosotros. ¡Nuevos aprendices que se reportan! ¿Cierto, Five?

translation.en: Uh, yeah!
She and me, we are trainees employed by Hinobi
translation.es: Sí, ella y yo. Somos aprendices, empleados por Hinobi para eso

translation.en: for the purposes of whatever the purpose is you just said.
translation.es: Somos aprendices, empleados por Hinobi para eso que tú acabas de decir.

translation.en: Very well.
translation.es: Muy bien. Solo conecten estos brazaletes

translation.en: Simply connect these Glitch gauntlets and choose start to begin!
translation.es: Muy bien. Solo conecten estos brazaletes y presionen Inicio para empezar.

translation.en: It's got some kinda UI. Like a radar, a minimap and... a targeting crosshair?
translation.es: ¿Tiene alguna interfase, como un radar, un minimapa y una mira?

translation.en: Move your wrists up, down and side to side.
translation.es: Muevan las muñecas arriba y abajo y a los lados.

translation.en: This is known as your targeting area.
translation.es: Esta es su área de ataque.

translation.en: Oh, I am loving where this is going.
Glitch signature acquired!
Now calculating the shortest route.
translation.es: Ahora calculando la ruta más corta.

translation.en: Uh, shortest route to what?
The shortest route to intercept the glitch!
translation.es: ¡La ruta más corta para interceptar el Glitch!

translation.en: Sock 'em! Sock 'em! Sock 'em!
Whoo- hoo!
I hate retro titles.
Glitch Techs detected. I said no backup!
You have reached your destination.
I've had it with you griefers!
translation.es: ¡Ya me cansé de ustedes! Intento limpiar el desastre que hicieron,

translation.en: I am trying to clean the mess you made, and you keep making it worse!
translation.es: ¡Ya me cansé de ustedes! Intento limpiar el desastre que hicieron, y siguen empeorando las cosas.

translation.en: Chomp Kitty?
Strategic update. Run away!
This is no longer my favorite video game!
translation.es: ¡Este ya no es mi videojuego favorito!

translation.en: - Uh, is there an instruction manual? -
Mitch? You're okay?
I am stuck in the belly of a malevolent digital construct,
translation.es: Estoy atrapado adentro de una construcción digital malévola,

translation.en: so, no, I'm not okay!  Help me, you morons!
translation.es: así que no, no estoy bien. ¡Ayúdenme, imbéciles!

translation.en: You want our help?
You're gonna admit what you've done and help us put things right again!
translation.es: Admitirás lo que hiciste y nos ayudarás a arreglar las cosas.

translation.en: Fine, just get me out of here! The static discharge is frizzing my hair!
translation.es: Bien, sáquenme de aquí. ¡La descarga eléctrica me crespa el pelo!

translation.en: Ooh! Maybe these'll help.
Let's see. Sparkly gem thingies, feathers, mushrooms... Ooh, pizza!
Hey, furball, ya hungry?
You fed it a power- up?
We probably should have stayed in the van.
translation.es: Debimos habernos quedado en la camioneta.

translation.en: Target glitch has gone viral!
translation.es: El Glitch se ha vuelto viral.

translation.en: What's a glitch?
A glitch is an artificially intelligent plixel construct!
translation.es: Un Glitch es una creación Plixel con inteligencia artificial.

translation.en: - So, basically, video game monsters! - I got it!
Yeah! Didn't like that, did ya?
They didn't like that. Run!
Use your gauntlets to drain its power. And get me out of here!
translation.es: Usa el brazalete para drenar su poder. ¡Y sáquenme de aquí!

translation.en: Uh, hey, BITT? Do these things have multi- target?
Multi- target activated.
- - Come on! Let's get him!
Uh, why is he eating the ball pit?
translation.es: ¿Por qué come la piscina de pelotas?

translation.en: Glitch intelligence is limited to base programming.
translation.es: La inteligencia del Glitch es programación básica.

translation.en: Oh, he thinks they're pellets!
Hurry! I am surrounded by toddler snot!
- That gives me a plan. - He loves plans.
translation.es: - Eso me da un plan. - Le encantan los planes.

translation.en: Uh, heavy!
Oh, boy.
- - It thinks you're food. Great plan!
Alert! Trainee down!
Uh, BITT, can a power- up's effect be reversed?
Power- ups can be modified to nerf a target.
translation.es: Pueden modificarse para debilitar un objetivo.

translation.en: I'll take that as a yes.
Uh, nice kitty!
Looks like game over.
Delete my browser history!
Alert, a Tech needs support. Now providing backup assistance!
translation.es: ¡Alerta! Un Tech necesita apoyo. Brindando refuerzos.

translation.en: - Miko! -
Here kitty, kitty, kitty, kitty!
Chomp on this.
Hey, pro, how'd you like your memory reset?
translation.es: Hola, profesional. ¿Te gustaría que te borre la memoria?

translation.en: Wha--
Caution, a Tech gauntlet is not to be used aggressively.
translation.es: El brazalete no debe usarse agresivamente.

translation.en: It is a tool to protect innocence, never to harm.
translation.es: Sirve para proteger inocentes, no para dañar.

translation.en: Yeah? Well, your MVP here really needs to read the dang manual.
translation.es: Sí, pues su mejor jugador necesita leer el manual.

translation.en: You gotta believe me, I wasn't really gonna do it!
translation.es: Tienen que creerme. No iba a hacerlo.

translation.en: I was freaked you wouldn't reset. Everybody resets!
translation.es: Me asusté que no te reiniciaras. Todos se reinician.

translation.en: You stole my win. Why?
To protect your lame gamer status?
translation.es: ¿Para proteger tu estado de jugador patético?

translation.en: I'm Mitch Williams.
I am the number one gamer in this city.
translation.es: Soy el jugador número uno de esta ciudad,

translation.en: You take that away from me, you may as well take everything.
translation.es: si me quitan eso, pueden llevarse todo.

translation.en: Besides, that win was bugged. He wasn't even the real winner.
translation.es: Igua, ese triunfo tenía un error. No eras el ganador real.

translation.en: - She was. - What?
translation.es: Ella era. ¿Qué? Pero Five lanzó el tiro ganador.

translation.en: But Five made the winning shot.
translation.es: ¿Qué? Pero Five lanzó el tiro ganador.

translation.en: Yeah, with your ball, remember?
- So I guess you won. - Huh.
No matter which one of us won, he still loses.
translation.es: No importa quién gane, él igual pierde.

translation.en: Please, don't!
If we wipe your precious gaming career, you've got nothing left to protect.
translation.es: Si borramos tu gran carrera como jugador, no tienes nada que proteger.

translation.en: I know I went too far, but do not take this from me.
translation.es: Sé que fui demasiado lejos, pero no me quiten esto.

translation.en: It's what I love.
It's who I am.
Me, too.
- Me, too. -
Come in, Mitch.
After the discharge, your signal went viral.  What happened in there?
translation.es: Luego de la descarga, tu señal se viralizó. ¿Qué pasó?

translation.en: You wanna tell him or should we?
translation.es: ¿Se lo dices tú o lo hacemos nosotros?

translation.en: So... your daughter wasn't lying when she told you
translation.es: Así que su hija no mentía cuando dijo

translation.en: a no- joke- giant- monster hand came out of your TV and trashed your living room.
translation.es: que un monstruo gigante salió de su TV y destrozó la sala.

translation.en: I'm sorry, what exactly are you people talking about?
We're talking about offering your daughter and her friend here
translation.es: Les ofrezco a su hija y a su amigo

translation.en: part- time jobs in the Hinobi Store's new technical support department.
translation.es: trabajos en el departamento de soporte técnico de la tienda Hinobi.

translation.en: A job? I do like the sound of that.
translation.es: ¿Un trabajo? Me gusta cómo suena eso.

translation.en: - Especially if it makes you happy. - Whoo- hoo!
translation.es: Sobre todo si te hace feliz.

translation.en: Thank you, thank you, thank you, thank you, thank you, thank you.
Okay, guys, you can do it now.
So, while I restore your system's memory, you will remember this.
translation.es: Mientras recupero la memoria del sistema, recordarán esto.

translation.en: Your daughter's gaming skills have earned her a job with Hinobi Tech Support.
translation.es: Las habilidades de juego de su hija le dieron trabajo con Hinobi Tech Support.

translation.en: And you're so proud.
Honey, wasn't Miko just here?
You know her. Probably wants to be early for that new job of hers.
translation.es: La conoces, seguro quiere llegar temprano a su trabajo nuevo.

translation.en: Whoa.
So this'll be your day- to- day.
Cash register's here, price gun's here, pooper's in the back and...
translation.es: La caja y la etiquetadora están aquí, el baño está atrás.

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Yeah, the place next door sells old donuts at half off.
translation.es: Y al lado venden rosquillas viejas a mitad de precio.

translation.en: - That's all? - What's better than half- off donuts?
translation.es: - ¿Es todo? - ¿Qué es mejor que rosquillas baratas?

translation.en: Exclusive swag, early release games, live events!
translation.es: Botín exclusivo, prelanzamientos de juegos, eventos en vivo.

translation.en: Yeah, if you earn points, you get the perks.
Oh, and there are your lockers.
Uh... awesome.
I got your awesome right here.
Excuse me.
- Yeah! - Cannonball!
Kids, welcome to Glitch Techs.
- Awesome! - This is amazing!
